addFriendModal.tooltip: You can add friends with their Mezon usernames
addFriendModal.alreadyFriends: You're already friends with that user!
addFriendModal.waitAccept: You have already sent a friend request to this user!

statusTapListFriends.all: Looks a little empty here! Let's get this party started by adding a few friends.
statusTapListFriends.online: It's quiet right now! Why not start a conversation and see who's around?
statusTapListFriends.pending: This is where you'll find friend requests you've sent and received.

statusTapSearchFriends.all: No friends match your search. Try another name.
statusTapSearchFriends.online: No one online matches your search. Try another name.

statusTapSearchFriends.block: No blocked users match your search. Try another name.
